text:
Hi all,

I'm interested in HubSpot CMS and learning all things H.S. — I work at Envato as a Senior Reviewer (ThemeForest) and I'm also a full stack developer, I hope I can connect with all of you. Feel free to DM and say hi.

Hey Ivor, a great place to start learning about HS and all things HS is our getting started guide here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started>

If you have any questions, just let us know :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@U01QG6MKY1J> :wave: 
So glad to see you here. I used to make stuff for ThemeForest previously so we kind know each other in some way :grin:

<@U01QG6MKY1J> documentation mentioned by <@U2H3TT8F2> is a great way to start I also would recommend check their academy videos on theme development so to combine two approaches here. If you need any help, I’d be happy to chat with you. Have a great day!
Hi <@UMZFZHVUJ> glad to see you here too :grinning:. Thank you both (cc <@U2H3TT8F2>), yeah I’ve already started reading the theme dev docs and so far so good!
<@UMZFZHVUJ> I’ll definitely DM you if I have any question :grinning: fortunately I’ve been able to be productive just by reading the docs. Thanks so much!
